title: Adaptive e-Learning Program for Enhancing Early Diagnostic Competencies in Cerebral Palsy

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental pediatric medical knowledge and understanding of neurological assessment concepts
context.additional_context: Clinical judgment training through virtual patient simulations and application of adaptive learning algorithms

learning_goals: Achieve over 85% accuracy in predicting cerebral palsy in infants under six months using diagnostic tools.
Reduce diagnostic decision-making time by 20% compared to baseline in virtual patient simulations.
Maintain a 70%+ application rate of early diagnosis protocols in real clinical settings within three months post-training.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
